articles.title: Chelsea praised for 'smart' transfer business, with expert lauding club's decision-making
articles.description: Chelsea have faced plenty of scrutiny for their transfer business, so it's perhaps a surprise to see one expert praise their decisions
articles.content:

articles.title: Millionär, Investor, schlechter Verlierer: Das Erfolgsgeheimnis von Österreichs Top-Angel
